content.text: Hello, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I love new technology, and I just started working at Google last week on self driving car research.
That is really cool! I love watching the rain.
I've never been a fan of rain, but I like the sound of it.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
Oh, that's too bad. I love music! Do you have a favorite genre?
I like a lot of different genres, but my favorite is country.
I've never been a fan of country music, but I can appreciate the talent.
I'm trying to balance my education, my pregnancy, and my mental health, and I want to make a difference in the world.
That's a lot to juggle! I'm impressed. I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
I'm not a car person, but I love Donna Karen clothing.
I've never heard of that brand.
It's a pretty high end brand, but I love the style.
I'm not really into fashion, but I do like to look nice.
I think we'll get along well.
